name: react-multi-site-workspace
description: Workspace para desarrollo de m√∫ltiples sitios React

scripts.build:all: npm run build:corporativa && npm run build:eyenga
scripts.install:all: npm run install:corporativa && npm run install:eyenga
scripts.create:corporativa: cd apps && npx create-react-app corporativa --template typescript
scripts.create:eyenga: cd apps && npx create-react-app eyenga --template typescript
scripts.setup: npm run create:corporativa && npm run create:eyenga && npm run install:all

author: Rafa
